channel.title: One good thing
channel.description:
[center]I just want to make a little topic because of the holiday season. No matter what religion you are (even if you aren't, like me), this season is a time of giving and helping one another. Try and think of how you're life has been for the past year, maybe it's not perfect, maybe you don't have the newest phone or a nicer car but just think that there is someone out there that has it worse off then you. I want to ask everyone who sees this to try and do [i]ONE[/i] good thing for the people around you who are worse off. Maybe it's a teacher who has two kids and is struggling, a man who wont be able to give his kids a nice Christmas because hes broke, or a local homeless man who could really use a warm coat or a nice meal. I'm not saying go out and do this for everyone you know, but if you can just put [i]ONE[/i] change for the better into someones life, it would make all the difference for them.
Happy Holidays everyone, Andrew[/center]

item.title: One good thing
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

^

if you guys think i am being a fag today i just had a horrible day, so fuck off.
If you are being a fag, aren't you having a nice day? I mean, nice hair, clean face, and properly dressed. Besides being fucked in the ass occationly it seems pretty awesome, maybe even worth it. 0.0 Got fact smacked.

item.title: One good thing
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

krackkid:

It’s not X-mas or happy holidays, Christmas is Christmas

This irritates me. The X comes from the greek letter Chi, which is the first letter of the Greek word Χριστός, translated as “Christ”.
“Happy Holidays” is to respect people who don’t celebrate Christmas, and if someone tells me Happy Holidays, I’m grateful they at least took the time to say something kind. I don’t mind if a Christian tells me Merry Christmas, an Atheist says Happy Holidays, a Jew says Happy Hanukkah, or Hell, even Happy Winter Solstice.

Read full topic

item.title: One good thing
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

I didn’t read the OP or anything but just saying.

I will tell everyone Merry Christmas, Muslims, Jews, etc doesn’t worry me its christmas time and they can deal with it. It’s not X-mas or happy holidays, Christmas is Christmas

Read full topic

item.title: One good thing
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Merry Christmas

Wish is made upon
Act on it before Christmas is gone
Give more than you recieve
Like life, the more you give, the Less with Grief
you don’t need a fancy phone
Give a Child a chance who is all alone
You pray for the people in need
Before you realize it, you have got your own family to feed.

Merry Christmas!!!

Read full topic
